pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast R and C++ Access to NIfTI Images // Provides very fast access to images stored in the NIfTI-1 file format http://www.nitrc.org/docman/view.php/26/64/nifti1.h, with seamless synchronisation between compiled C and interpreted R code. Not to be confused with 'RNiftyReg', which provides tools for image registration.
